page.title: 04Farming
page.content: The farms in our area vary in size from 100-400 acres approximately. rom the 5 or 6 farmers who replied to our questionnnaire we discovered they had these fields: 16 barley, 12 grass, 8 wheat, 6 oil seed rape, 6 potatoes and 1 turnip. There are over 600 cattle, 400 being cows for two dairy farms, 210 beef catle and 15 bulls on one farm. A farmworker's day: 6.30 am up, breakfast and wash; 7 am start work, e.g. plough. 9-9.30 am teabreak; 11.45 - 1.00 pm dinner; 3 pm teabreak; 5 pm tea; 6-8 more work.
